author: mini_mads1980
title: OK Representation
review:
Box/Instructions

The parts come in a silver bag attached to the front of the January comic with the instructions inside on the back of a poster.

Parts

Not many parts, but mostly gray. A couple of 6 X 6 circular pieces are probably the best parts.

Minifigures

None.

The build

A simple build but for the size enjoyable.

The completed model

An ok representation of the Millennium Falcon, although the round dish does not match with the Episode 7 images on the packet.

Overall opinion

I like this, but would have liked it more if all the parts were in it! Unlike normal sets you get no spares. With small 1 X 1 studs these are needed. I only had two of the four dark gray ones required to go on the top at the back. Overall it's good for a free set.

author: als_1971
title: any falcon is good
review:
Box/Instructions

Bag attached to comic. Instructions are in the comic.

 

Parts

Simple selection of grey parts

Minifigures

None

The build

Simple but fun for a small model

The completed model

Quite a good version for its size

Overall opinion

As I said in the title any version of the Falcon is good so I am pleased to add this to my collection. I don't think you could ask for more in a comic giveaway and at this size.
